title: Toy Story Treats
brief_description: A series of shorts/spots originally aired on ABC’s One Saturday Morning, which were also included on the Toy Story DVDs as “Toy Story Treats”.

constellations_other.name: Storytelling through shadow play
constellations_other.description: Shadow play has brought stories to life for thousands of years and is still used today.

description: A series of shorts/spots originally aired on ABC’s One Saturday Morning, which were also included on the Toy Story DVDs as “Toy Story Treats”.
